name: Sorcevival
description:
Sorcevival is a horde survival game in which you must battle ever-growing waves of enemies while enhancing and customizing your spells. Survive for 15 minutes, conquer Bosses, and acquire mana to upgrade your character.

All your spells can be tailored using a talent tree, and each time you defeat an elite, you will gain a rune that allows you to do anything from altering the spell's element to granting it unique synergies.



Vanquish Bosses and obtain Active abilities to employ in moments of utmost need.



Utilize the acquired mana to enhance your stats and unlock new items, spells, and runes.
